Memcpy performance test

The performance and optimzation test for memcpy. Uses the framework provided by "test_" Test framework for performance testing and "loop_" Standard loops for testing and reporting. More...
Status

The testing and optimization has been completed

Results

  • Winner: lx_memcpy_movq_r()
  • Honorable mention: lx_memcpy_si1() best non-mmx implementation
Candidates

  • glibc_memcpy()
  • lx_memcpy_movq()
  • lx_memcpy_movq_r()
  • lx_memcpy_noleal()
  • lx_memcpy_noleal_128()
  • lx_memcpy_si0()
  • lx_memcpy_si1()
Notes While the lx_memcpy_movq_r() is the winner, it may not be acceptable as a glibc function as the kernel uses only light weight threading and doesn't protect the FPU state.
